title: Allow loading and saving ExternalTools to Database
author: Benchwork
body_snippet:
<!--

it would be nice to be able to store and share the external tools info in the same database as config. yes I know that a lot is dependent on the location of the external tools, and there probably need be a way to check for each tool and disable if they ...
